page.title: 13Ashcott - The community
page.content: In the village there is a good {community}spirit.The people adjust well to the newcomers and changes.The main village{shop}is in constant use, and sells everything that people need. A lot of people would find it very awkward shopping in the towns all the time.The only trouble caused is by having people coming in from nearby towns.The many inns and pubs provide plenty of entertainment.The hall houses playgroups,meetings and similar functions including many organisations ,clubs and sales or parties.Very few people attend services in the very beautiful,well kept{church.}Familiar church-goers are not deterred,but younger people are not interested.Also ,now nobody forces their families to attend.There is a playing{field}in Ashcott,but not as the people would like.
